quest.name: Lurkers in the Lake
journal:
î‚¾ Quest Sync
The angry amaro will not stand for any more Fuath devilry.
objectives: Lie in wait for the Fuath.

dialogue.name: ANGRYAMARO03421
dialogue.text: You! You look like a formidable womanman! Please, will you not lend me a hand?

dialogue.name: ANGRYAMARO03421
dialogue.text: You see, with fewer of your kind coming to Il Mheg of late, the Fuath have taken to harassing us amaro instead.

dialogue.name: ANGRYAMARO03421
dialogue.text: For a while we put up with their devilry, but the final straw came when they stole one of our eggs! This cannot be borne!

dialogue.name: ANGRYAMARO03421
dialogue.text: So, I will go near the banks of Longmirror Lake to lure out the Fuath. When they show themselves, I want you to give them a trouncing they'll never forget!

dialogue.name: ANGRYAMARO03421
dialogue.text: Quickly, hide yourself! The Fuath will be here ere long!

dialogue.name: BALLOON
dialogue.text: All by your lonesome, are you?

dialogue.name: ANGRYAMARO03421
dialogue.text: Thank you! That should teach them not to bother us for a good while!

dialogue.name: ANGRYAMARO03421
dialogue.text: As they had intended for me just now, the Fuath grow their ranks by dragging living beings into the water. Not even life that still resides within an egg is spared.

dialogue.name: ANGRYAMARO03421
dialogue.text: They are a treacherous lot, and you'd do well to avoid them at all costs. But if you have no choice but to deal with them, you mustn't lower your guard. Not even for a heartbeat.

dialogue.name: ANGRYAMARO03421
dialogue.text: But come, let us return to Wolekdorf. I would give you proper thanks.

dialogue.name: ANGRYAMARO03421
dialogue.text: There you are. Please accept this as a token of my gratitude.

dialogue.name: ANGRYAMARO03421
dialogue.text: 'Tis a small price to pay for the peace of mind you have given us.
